mapper.insert: INSERT INTO library_profile (student_id, password, seat_label, seat_id, auto_enable, send_key) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{password}, #{seatLabel}, #{seatId}, #{autoEnable}, #{sendKey}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE password = #{password}, seat_label = #{seatLabel}, seat_id = #{seatId}, auto_enable = #{autoEnable}, send_key = #{sendKey}
